title: Arctic Fire
description: She never expected that vampire to walk into Clint’s and unleash terror on her small desert town. With people dying every day, Quinn realizes she must delve deeper into her power if she's going to save her loved ones. However, as new enemies arise, allies are found, and friends are lost, he realizes he might have to become something he swore he never would again… a monster. ***The Fire and Ice series is a spinoff of The Kindred Series, but you do not have to read The Kindred Series to enjoy this one. The maturity level of this series will grow with each book and is recommended for readers 17+***
author: Erica Stevens
